DOC.brief_summary: To assess which commercially available measurement device is most accurate in measuring low (< 1.0 D) degrees of corneal astigmatism.
DOC.criteria: 50 years of age and older Proof of eye exam within the last 3 months Corneal astigmatism of <1.0 diopter Prior history of refractive or corneal surgery Corneal trauma/disease Intraocular surgery
